name: Fetch! (itch) (nickbiglin)
description: Fetch! is a game I made for my Game Programming and Simulation class at Montgomery County Community College. This was an extra credit assignment, where we had to make a non-violent FPS game. While the protagonist of this game does not "shoot", he does throw a projectile. There are no goals/achievements, and there is no way to "win" at Fetch! When one plays fetch with a dog in real life, is there a way to "win"? This game is simply a fun time-waster. Thanks for checking my game out!
